original_text: And after that came his brother out, and his hand took hold on Esau's heel; and his name was called Jacob: and Isaac was threescore years old when she bare them.
korean_text: 후에 나온 아우는 손으로 에서의 발꿈치를 잡았으므로 그 이름을 야곱이라 하였으며 리브가가 그들을 낳을 때에 이삭이 육십 세였더라

sentences.original_text: And after that came his brother out
and his hand took hold on Esau's heel
and his name was called Jacob
and Isaac was threescore years old
